item.title: FullStackOfNewGeneration/链接现实与信息系统的全栈开发技术
item.description: 0.Short Intro. our team using the similar stack with lean. Front-End: Desktop: Electron Mobile: Ionic + Cordova Plugin Design Material-Design for Angularjs’s Desktop apps. Ionic-Material for Angularjs’s Mobile apps. Back-End Laravel for normal HTTP REST API. Golang for Internet of Thing’s Socket API & our Gis System. RAML for generating SDK files both of front/back-end. Admiring that RAML1.0 is comming. Database Postgresql(for gis) we like it very much. MongoDB(for user
